encyclopedia.content: MATLAB函数size简介 函数功能：返回数组的尺寸 语法格式： d = size(X) 返回数组X每一维的大小，其中d是一个向量，元素个数为ndims(X)。如果X是一个标量（在Matlab也就是一个1行乘以1列的数组），size(X)将返回[1 1]。 [m,n] = size(X) 返回矩阵X的尺寸信息， 并存储在m、n中。其中m中存储的是行数，n中存储的是列数。 m = size(X,dim) 返回X的第dim维的尺寸。 [d1,d2,d3,...,dn] = size(X), 当n大于1时， 返回X各维的尺寸， 并存

entry.def: The size of something is how big or small it is. Something's size is determined by comparing it to other things, counting it, or measuring it.

example.ex: Scientists have found the bones of a hoofed grazing animal about the size of a small horse...
example.tran: 科学家们已经发现了一种约有马驹般大小的有蹄草食性动物的骨骼。

example.ex: In 1970 the average size of a French farm was 19 hectares...
example.tran: 1970 年，法国农场的平均规模为 19 公顷。

entry.def: The size of something is the fact that it is very large.

example.ex: He knows the size of the task...
example.tran: 他明白这个任务有多艰巨。

example.ex: Jack walked around the hotel and was mesmerized by its sheer size.
example.tran: 杰克在宾馆里四处转了转，为其宏伟气势所倾倒。

entry.tran: (尤指衣服、鞋子等的)尺寸，尺码，号
entry.def: A size is one of a series of graded measurements, especially for things such as clothes or shoes.

example.ex: My sister is the same height but only a size 12...
example.tran: 我姐姐是一样的身高，不过只穿 12 号的。

example.ex: I tried them on and they were the right size.
example.tran: 我试穿了一下，大小正合适。

entry.tran: 使有自知之明;灭…的嚣张气焰
entry.def: If someone is cut down to size, something happens to make them realize that they are not as important as they think they are.

example.ex: The once-powerful post unions have been cut down to size.
example.tran: 一度很强势的邮政联盟已经威风不再。

entry.def: If an object is cut to size, its size is altered to make it suitable for a particular purpose.

example.ex: Every piece of timber was planed, cut to size and stained with cedar preservative.
example.tran: 每根木材都被刨平了，切割成一定尺寸，并涂上了雪松防腐剂。

entry.def: If you try something on for size, you try it to see if it is suitable for you.

example.ex: She was trying on an $8,000 jacket for size...
example.tran: 她正在试穿一件价值 8,000 美元的短外套。

example.ex: He suggests that Nietzsche was trying each style on for size.
example.tran: 他的言下之意是尼采当时正在尝试每一种风格。

means.word_mean: 1. the physical magnitude of something (how big it is);

sentences.sentence: "a wolf is about the size of a large dog"

means.word_mean: 2. the property resulting from being one of a series of graduated measurements (as of clothing);
3. any glutinous material used to fill pores in surfaces or to stiffen fabrics;

sentences.sentence: "she hates me, that's about the size of it"
"he blanched when he saw the size of the bill"
"the only city of any size in that area"

means.word_mean: 1. cover or stiffen or glaze a porous material with size or sizing (a glutinous substance)
3. make to a size; bring to a suitable size

Sentence.sentence: Even simple visual cues, like plate size and fighting, have been shown to affect portion size and consumption.
Even simple visual cues, like plate size and fighting, have been shown to affect portion size and consumption.
This disparity (差异) suggests the memory of our previous meal may have a bigger influence on our appetite than the actual size of the meal.
Once in Mexico, they establish themselves in one of about 15 sizes in the mountain forth.
They will vary with the size of vehicles.

Major supermarkets, in meeting consumer expectations, will often reject entire crops of perfectly edible fruit and vegetables at the farm because they do not meet exacting marketing standards for their physical characteristics, such as size and appearance.

sentences.en: The bottles are both of a size.
There are all sizes of gloves in our shop.

你把这些钉子按大小分开好吗?

sentences.en: In this game, the three-year-old children are asked to size down the ten toy cars within 30 seconds.
sentences.cn: 在这个游戏里, 这些三岁的儿童要在三十秒内把十辆玩具汽车由大到小排列出来。

jushi.english: The company is able to keep its prices down simply because of its size.
jushi.chinese: 该公司之所以能保持价格低廉只是因为公司规模大。

jushi.english: This book is of the same size as that.
jushi.chinese: 这本书同那本书一样大小。
